_meanings:
{@--1@} Close adherence or 
attendance; connection, conjunction, 
association; {#sAnuzaMgARi kalyARAni#} <ls>U. 7</ls>
good things closely follow one 
another (come close upon one 
another).

{@--4@} A word or words repeated
from the context to supply an
ellipsis.

{@--6@} Connection
of a subsequent with a previous
act.

{@--10@} (In NyƒÅya) 
Connecting together the {#upanaya#} or 
application and {#nigamana#} or conclusion by the
use of the pronoun {#idaM#}  
({#upanayavAkyasTasya ayamiti padasya nigamanavAkye AkarzaRaM#}).
